channel.title: Extras on Damaris Zurell research
channel.description: Recent content in Extras on Damaris Zurell research

item.title: Publications
item.description: ResearcherID E-2439-2012. You can also find me on ResearchGate and GoogleScholar. Journal articles - Book chapters Peer-reviewed journal articles in press - 2020 - 2019 - 2018 - 2017 - 2016 - 2015 - 2014 - 2013 - 2012 - pre 2012 - submitted in press 34 – Becciu P, Rotics S, Horvitz N, Kaatz M, Fiedler W, Zurell D, Flack A, Jeltsch F, Wikelski M, Nathan R, Sapir N (2020) Causes and consequences of facultative sea crossing in a soaring migrant.

item.title: Join the lab

item.description: Lab alumni Research assistants 2017-2018 – Helge Gross (M.Sc.) – WSL, SCODA project (SNF) – data management and species distribution modelling 2017-2018 – Katarina Varga (M.Sc) – WSL, SCODA project (SNF) – ornithologist, bird territory mapping Switzerland 2015 – Helge Gross – Uni Potsdam and WSL – data management, habitat selection in white storks 2015 – Lena Schlag – Uni Potsdam and WSL – home range selection in white storks 2014-2015 – Merlin Schäfer – Uni Potsdam and WSL – computer scientist, optimal annual routine models for migratory animals Master 2018-2019 – Hendrik Bluhm – “Mapping habitat suitability and landscape connectivity for moose (Alces alces) in Central Europe” – M.

item.title: Damaris Zurell
item.description: Contact - Education - Career - Projects - Awards - Professional activities - Memberships Contact details Dr. Damaris Zurell Geography Department | Humboldt-Universität zu Berlin Unter den Linden 6 | D-10099 Berlin | Germany Office: Rudower Chaussee 16 | D-12489 Berlin | Room 1.209 Phone: +49 30 2093 6839 My institutional website Education 2011 – PhD in Geoecology, University of Potsdam, Inst. of Earth and Environmental Sciences 2007 – Diplom (M.

item.title: Downloads
item.description: You can download some of my codes from my github site. Repository IBM_OptimalForaging C++ codes for individual-based foraging model described in Zurell et al. (2015) Oikos. Repository Rcodes_MapNovelEnvironments_SDMs R codes for mapping novel environments (SDM inflated response curves and environmental overlap masks) described in Zurell et al. (2012) DDI.
